text: Arthur Worth "Bud" Collins, Jr. (June 17, 1929 â€“ March 4, 2016) was an American journalist and television sportscaster. He was best known for his tennis commentary. Collins was born in Lima, Ohio. For several years with the Boston Globe, he was a general and political columnist. In 1967, he was a candidate for mayor of Boston. Collins died on March 4, 2016 in Brookline, Massachusetts.
